attachments.title: Bibliometrix: An R-tool for comprehensive science mapping analysis
attachments.citation: Aria, M., & Cuccurullo, C. (2017). Bibliometrix: An R-tool for comprehensive science mapping analysis. Journal of Informetrics, 11(4), 959–975. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.joi.2017.08.007

attachments.title: A bibliometric analysis: A tutorial for the bibliometrix package in R using IRT literature
attachments.citation: Büyükkıdık, S. (2022). A bibliometric analysis: A tutorial for the bibliometrix package in R using IRT literature. Eğitimde ve Psikolojide Ölçme ve Değerlendirme Dergisi, 13. https://doi.org/10.21031/epod.1069307

attachments.title: Preferred reporting items for systematic reviews and meta-analyses: The PRISMA statement
attachments.citation: Moher, D., Liberati, A., Tetzlaff, J., Altman, D. G., & The PRISMA Group. (2009). Preferred reporting items for systematic reviews and meta-analyses: The PRISMA statement. PLoS Medicine, 6(7), e1000097. https://doi.org/10.1371/journal.pmed.1000097

attachments.title: PRISMA 2020 explanation and elaboration: Updated guidance and exemplars for reporting systematic reviews
attachments.citation: Page, M. J., Moher, D., Bossuyt, P. M., Boutron, I., Hoffmann, T. C., Mulrow, C. D., Shamseer, L., Tetzlaff, J. M., Akl, E. A., Brennan, S. E., Chou, R., Glanville, J., Grimshaw, J. M., Hróbjartsson, A., Lalu, M. M., Li, T., Loder, E. W., Mayo-Wilson, E., McDonald, S., … McKenzie, J. E. (2021). PRISMA 2020 explanation and elaboration: Updated guidance and exemplars for reporting systematic reviews. BMJ, 372, n160. https://doi.org/10.1136/bmj.n160

prompt:
Now, Listen to me:
基于对书中主题和讨论的理解, 请从原文提取不同有利的方法或证据回答一下问题：分别指出这些论文的研究方法, 属于  Meta-Analyses 还是  Systematic Reviews?

Your answer should be in Chinese, using the Markdown format for layout.
The instructions for the attachments uploaded:
- Bibliometrix: An R-tool for comprehensive science mapping analysis, was published on 2017. (It can be cite this paper as ⁨Aria⁩ and ⁨Cuccurullo⁩, 2017 on your answer). 
- A bibliometric analysis: A tutorial for the bibliometrix package in R using IRT literature, was published on 2022. (It can be cite this paper as Büyükkıdık, 2022 on your answer). 
- Preferred reporting items for systematic reviews and meta-analyses: The PRISMA statement, was published on 2009. This paper serves as the dominant theoretical frameworks for all subsequent papers included in the appendix. (It can be cite this paper as Moher et al., 2009 on your answer). 
- PRISMA 2020 explanation and elaboration: Updated guidance and exemplars for reporting systematic reviews, was published on 2021. (It can be cite this paper as Page et al., 2021 on your answer).
response:
根据您提供的文件和相关说明，以下是对各篇论文的研究方法的分析：

### 1. "Bibliometrix: An R-tool for comprehensive science mapping analysis" (Aria⁨ 和 Cuccurullo⁩, 2017)
这篇论文介绍了一个名为Bibliometrix的R工具，它用于全面科学映射分析。根据文章内容，该研究主要是开发和介绍一个科学映射工具，而不是进行Meta-Analyses或Systematic Reviews。因此，这项工作不属于Meta-Analyses或Systematic Reviews的研究方法。

### 2. "A bibliometric analysis: A tutorial for the bibliometrix package in R using IRT literature" (Büyükkıdık, 2022)
这篇论文是一个关于如何使用R语言中的Bibliometrix包进行文献计量分析的教程，特别针对IRT（项目反应理论）文献。根据论文摘要，研究使用了Web of Science数据库中的IRT相关文章进行了文献计量分析。这篇论文进行了文献计量学研究，而不是传统意义上的Meta-Analyses或Systematic Reviews。然而，文献计量分析可以作为Systematic Reviews的一部分，用于评估某一领域内的研究趋势和模式。

### 3. "Preferred reporting items for systematic reviews and meta-analyses: The PRISMA statement" (Moher et al., 2009)
这篇论文是关于系统评价和Meta-Analyses报告的首选项目，被称为PRISMA声明。它提供了一个框架和检查表，用于确保系统评价和Meta-Analyses的透明和完整报告。这篇论文本身不是Meta-Analyses或Systematic Reviews，而是关于如何报告这些研究的指导性文件。

### 4. "PRISMA 2020 explanation and elaboration: Updated guidance and exemplars for reporting systematic reviews" (Page et al., 2021)
这篇论文是对PRISMA声明的更新，提供了关于如何报告系统评价的更新指导和示例。与Moher et al., 2009相同，这篇论文本身不进行Meta-Analyses或Systematic Reviews，而是提供了报告这些研究的指导。

综上所述，这些论文中没有一篇是直接进行Meta-Analyses或Systematic Reviews的研究，而是提供了关于如何进行这些研究或如何使用特定工具进行相关分析的指导和方法。在Markdown格式下，可以这样布局：

```markdown
### 文献计量分析方法
- **Aria⁨ 和 Cuccurullo⁩, 2017**: 开发和介绍科学映射工具Bibliometrix，不属于Meta-Analyses或Systematic Reviews。
- **Büyükkıdık, 2022**: 使用Bibliometrix包进行IRT文献的文献计量分析，可以视为Systematic Reviews的一部分，但不是传统意义上的Systematic Reviews。
- **Moher et al., 2009**: 提供系统评价和Meta-Analyses报告的PRISMA声明，是指导性文件，不是研究报告。
- **Page et al., 2021**: 更新PRISMA声明，提供报告系统评价的指导，同样不是研究报告。
```
title:
Now, Listen to me:
基于对书中主题和讨
quection: 基于对书中主题和讨论的理解, 请从原文提取不同有利的方法或证据回答一下问题：分别指出这些论文的研究方法, 属于  Meta-Analyses 还是  Systematic Reviews?
